title: Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies
description:
The Manager is the office’s ultimate authority figure, tasked with ensuring productivity and firing the Slackers hiding among the Specialists. Ale & Tale Tavern
Slackers The Slacker’s goal is to goof off without getting caught. Whether it’s playing Minesweeper , or taking a dump, Slackers must blend in to avoid the Manager’s wrath .
Specialists Specialists are the backbone of the company, assigned various tasks that keep the office running smoothly. But even the hardest workers know that productivity sometimes requires a coffee break.
